error.message: Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\UrlGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\comment_perm\CommentPermissions. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Url instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to comment_perm.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
